featured.text: Founded in 1992, with some 28,000 listings, this company itself as the world’s largest home exchange club, reporting that membership has increased 30% this year.

definition.zh_def: 會員身份或地位，通常指加入某個組織或團體的權利和義務。
definition.en_def: The state of being a member of a group or organization, often involving certain rights and responsibilities.
definition.example: Her membership in the club allows her to participate in exclusive events.
